members.description: No feature outside or overlapping the bounds will be modified. Reference line features may be split at the specified bounds.
members.label: Use strict bounds handling

members.description: All reference features within the specified bounds will be removed.
members.label: Full replacement

members.description: Disables the snapping of unconnected ways before changeset derivation.
members.label: Disable way snapping

members.description: Disables the conflation of data cut out during replacement and the replacement data.
members.label: Disable conflation
